text: @SecAzar @POTUS Please stop gaslighting me. The statistics say other wise. The US population is 5% of the world. Yet we have a third of all it’s covid-19 cases, & 28% of all covid-10 deaths.  U could have contained this, but u blew the chance. And your response was the worst in the world. #Clown
